title: Beginning of the End for Ronaldo?
description:
The FC crew discuss Cristiano Ronaldo's Instagram response to leaving the ground early during Man United's win against Tottenham and ask if this is the beginning of the end for Portuguese superstar. Plus, reaction to Steven Gerrard getting the sack at Aston Villa and Barcelona selecting a few new faces after their Clasico defeat in their 3-0 win over Villarreal.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Cristiano Ronaldo responds to walking off early; Steven Gerrard sacked; Barcelona's new starters shine
